thread.title: Mrs Kay Gibbins
thread.title_full: SHOWER SEAL LTD reviewed by Mrs Kay Gibbins

author: Mrs Kay Gibbins
title: Mrs Kay Gibbins
text:
Found exactly the shower seal I required for my 7 fold shower screen, been looking for a very long time.
Specifications fully detailed, photo a great assistance.
Ordering simple.
Delivery update helpful.
Delivery three days from order.
Easy to fit. Shower now as new again!
Excellent from start to finish.
